Suhana Bedi

I'm a second-year PhD student in Biomedical Data Science at Stanford University, working at the intersection of AI and healthcare. My focus is developing and evaluating Foundation Models that don't just perform well in controlled settings, but can actually make a meaningful difference in real medical practice.
